note: The Unheard Beethoven has since 1999 offered free synthesized versions of unpublished and unrecorded Beethoven compositions. In the process, we were able to reconstruct a lost Beethoven lied and our realizations of sketched compositions (most notably the Macbeth Overture) have won acclaim globally. The Unheard Beethoven website also include a rundown of the recordings of rare Beethoven works, and worked with both Deutsche Grammophon and Naxos on their Beethoven 250 boxes.
